title: Needful Things 1993 Steven King Original 3hrs Full Length mp4
description:
This is the Original four-hour (3 hrs without commercials) movie as shown on TV 1993. It was recorded on VHS tape at that time. As far as I know -- that is the only way to get the full length as it was released only two-hours. Yes, that means you are missing one hour (33%) when you purchase the released versions. Get this one and you'll not want to watch the released edited cut-up version again even if it is a better resolution. Too bad the released DVDs are reduced to only 2 hours. I am sure you will agree that the extra hour makes this a much better really great classic.

Runtime: 3 hrs 4 min (184 minutes)
